DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate macular sensitivity correlation visual acuity Spectral Domain Optical Coherence Tomography ( SD-OCT ) eye idiopathic epiretinal membrane ( ERM ) . Design : Cross sectional case-control series . Methods : Setting : Dijon University Hospital . Patients : Forty nine patient ( 49 eye ) idiopathic ERM twenty-seven healthy patient ( 27 eye ) control group . Main outcome measurement : Microperimetry , Spectral Domain Optical Coherence Tomography ( SD-OCT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Microperimetry Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) Idiopathic Epiretinal Membrane
DOC.criteria: Epiretinal Membrane Age relate macular degeneration Diabetic macular edema
